title: MacroMate Clinical
description: Use text expansion and macros to quickly insert common phrases, saving time and ensuring consistency in clinical documentation and notes.

title: Consult Tracker
description: Monitor and manage patient consultations efficiently with real-time updates, appointment tracking, medical notes, and follow-up scheduling tools.

title: Team Calendar
description: View and manage your team's schedule with ease, including shifts, availability, upcoming appointments, and assignment coordination in one place.

title: Training Materials
description: Access learning resources and documentation to support staff training, improve workflows, and ensure accurate use of system features and tools.

title: Directory
description: Quickly find contact details for team members, including phone numbers, emails, and roles, to streamline communication and collaboration.

title: Suggestions and Feedback
description: Provide input to improve the system by sharing feedback, suggesting features, and helping enhance usability and performance for all users.

title: Dispo Consult
description: Use the Patient Discharge Planning Tool to coordinate care transitions, set follow-up tasks, and ensure safe, informed patient discharges.
